did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: David L. Cole Report on "Conscious Promotion in Practice of Better Labor-Management Cooperation", 1955-1955
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: David L. Cole Report to ILO Director David A. Morse on the proposed "conscious promotion in practice of better labor-management cooperation," September 22, 1955.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of David L. Cole's Report to ILO Director David A. Morse on the proposed "conscious promotion in practice of better labor-management cooperation," September 22, 1955.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: David L. Cole Report on "Conscious Promotion in Practice of Better Labor-Management Cooperation" #6116m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
